text: Bound for Glory is a yearly professional wrestling pay-per-view event made by Impact Wrestling, which used to be called Total Nonstop Action Wrestling (TNA). The event is usually produced in October and is similar to their rival WWE's WrestleMania. The first Bound for Glory event took place on October 23, 2005 at the TNA Impact! Zone in Orlando, Florida. ==Dates and venues== Event Date City Arena Main event Bound for Glory (2005) October 23, 2005 Orlando, Florida TNA Impact! Zone Jeff Jarrett (c) vs. Rhino for the NWA World Heavyweight Championship with Tito Ortiz as special guest referee Bound for Glory (2006) October 22, 2006 Plymouth Township, Michigan Compuware Sports Arena Jeff Jarrett (c) vs. Sting in a Title vs. Career match for the NWA World Heavyweight Championship with Kurt Angle as the Special Outside Enforcer Bound for Glory (2007) October 14, 2007 Duluth, Georgia Gwinnett Center Kurt Angle (c) vs. Sting for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory IV October 12, 2008 Hoffman Estates, Illinois Sears Centre Samoa Joe (c) vs. Sting for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2009) October 18, 2009 Irvine, California Bren Events Center A.J. Styles (c) versus Sting for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2010) October 10, 2010 Daytona Beach, Florida Ocean Center Jeff Hardy vs. Kurt Angle vs. Mr. Anderson in a Three Way match for the vacant TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2011) October 16, 2011 Philadelphia, Pennsylvania Liacouras Center Kurt Angle (c) vs. Bobby Roode for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2012) October 14, 2012 Phoenix, Arizona Grand Canyon University Arena Austin Aries (c) vs. Jeff Hardy for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2013) October 20, 2013 San Diego, California Viejas Arena Bully Ray (c) vs. A.J. Styles for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2014) October 12, 2014 Tokyo, Japan Korakuen Hall The Great Muta and Tajiri vs. James Storm and The Great Sanada Bound For Glory (2015) October 4, 2015 Concord, North Carolina Cabarrus Arena Ethan Carter III (c) and Drew Galloway vs. Matt Hardy for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2016) October 6, 2016 Orlando, Florida Impact Zone Lashley (c) vs. Ethan Carter III for the TNA World Heavyweight Championship Bound for Glory (2017) October 2, 2017 Ottawa, Ontario Aberdeen Pavilion Eli Drake (c) vs. Johnny Impact for the Impact Global Championship Bound for Glory (2018) October 14, 2018 Astoria, New York Melrose Ballroom Austin Aries (c) vs. Johnny Impact for the Impact World Championship Bound for Glory (2019) October 20, 2019 Villa Park, Illinois Odeum Expo Center Brian Cage (c) vs. Sami Callihan for the Impact World Championship Bound for Glory (2020) October 24, 2020 Nashville, Tennessee Skyway Studios Eric Young (c) vs. Rich Swann for the Impact World Championship Bound for Glory (2021) October 23, 2021 Sunrise Manor, Nevada Sam's Town Live Christian Cage (c) vs. Josh Alexander for the Impact World Championship Bound for Glory (2022) October 7, 2022 Albany, New York Albany Armory Josh Alexander (c) vs Eddie Edwards for the Impact World Championship Bound for Glory (2023) October 21, 2023 Chicago, Illinois Cicero Stadium Alex Shelley (c) vs. Josh Alexander for the Impact World Championship Bound for Glory (2024) October 26, 2024 Detroit, Michigan Wayne State Fieldhouse TBA ==Other websites== *TNA website Category:Total Nonstop Action Wrestling Category:October events
title: TNA Bound for Glory
